title: SD-LAN PoE/PoE+
description:
Description
PoE permits electric power, along with data, to be passed over a copper Ethernet LAN cable. Powered devices that support PoE—such as voice over IP (VoIP) telephones, wireless access points, video cameras, and point-of-sale devices—can receive power safely from the same access ports that are used to connect personal computers to the network.

Business Scope:
PoE permits electric power, along with data, to be passed over a copper Ethernet LAN cable. Powered devices that support PoE—such as voice over IP (VoIP) telephones, wireless access points, video cameras, and point-of-sale devices—can receive power safely from the same access ports that are used to connect personal computers to the network.
